captions.text: Sup, I'm Stas Davidov
Today's such a great day! Such a great day!
Almost as great as this vid of a snowplower sent by DimitryMay
Average day on average gas station in Nizhnee Zaporozhye.
Boring and expressionless.
But add the Flight of the Valkyries and everything changes
How i hate these guys who splash you when you're standing on the bus stop or walking down the street.
I'm sure hell has a special place for these fags.
Where every living day Roman Trachtenberg shoves pineapples up their asses and tell them fresh jokes.
Get the feeling that Sub-Zero himself is behind the wheel.
He's plowing the streets and taking lives!
Guy's lucky that the avalanche that hit him was only snow
It could've been gravel. or LAVA!
And this is Horosho!
Second vid was sent by 128greek.
It needs an intro.
There's this wonderful Princeton University Russian language course
And this vid is a work of a student from St. Petersburg University.
And it shows a recreation of one of these Russian language courses.
I'm hungry
What's in the fridge?
I dunno, take a look.
Half-of banana, sausage, caviar and a bottle of beer.
What are you doing? This is Vadik's beer.
So what? Who is he anyway? President of America?
Unknown fact - Obama's middle name is Vadik. Yes, Barack Vadik Obama.
Ok, I dunno who's Vadik and why they have his beer in the fridge.
And who cares when they start singing and dancing like Boliwood!
These Princeton linguists are quite a strange bunch.
Listen for yourself! Lesson 23. Dialogue. A. You're drinking my vodka.
And what kind of dialogues do the French have then?
Francois, what are you doing? You're eating Pierre's bagette!
So what? Who's this Pierre anyway? Chancellor  of Germany?
And this is Horosho?
Internet has seen it all - planking, owling, batmaning, milking, even fisting.
Now watch this vid.
It's called Harlem Shake.
Seems like nothing new.
But try YouTubing it!
And that's just the tip.
Even the army has it!
I adore the internet, only there can we find these nice activities!
Altho, enything is better than "let's play'' vids
And because TiX is the most progressive show on RuNet, we just had to do this.
And this is Horosho!
Got a gig. Click here, check it out.
That’s all folks, Subscribe, click “like”, send your videos here [thisishorosho.ru], cya on Friday!

That’s all folks, Subscribe, click “like”, send your videos ............
�

title: This is Хорошо - Гарлем шейк (╬ ಠ益ಠ) [HARLEM SHAKE]
